content: Ok, so I linked the certificate to my LinkedIn profile. I'd like to do one section at a time for this role. The Sales resume I uploaded was very tailored to Lily AI on MEDDIC and PoV, so those do not need to be included in this one. I think that was a very sales enablement role with the tasks completed on the crm build out. So... let's start with the Executive Summary. Some things to consider are like you pointed out adding the upskilling to the exec summary and/or adding a small section above pollen for data analytics upskilling which includes the data analytics course, LeetCode SQL 50 completion and Mode's SQL training.
